attributes.action: Allow dogs on the Glasgow subway
attributes.additional_details: London and New York are way more densely populated cities and they get dogs on their subways. It’s something everyone in Glasgow talks about, there’s no reason for dogs to not be allowed on. I’d use the subway so much more if I could take my dog. She’s too lazy to walk to the west end but all of her favourite places are there, so I have to spend like £50 on uber pet to get her there and back. I can’t be the only one.
attributes.background: Tell the city council to let dogs go on the subway

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level. 

You could ask your MP to take action on your concerns about this issue, including by asking them to present a public (paper) petition about this. 

You can find contact details for your local MP here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP 

And you can find out how to ask your MP to present a public (paper) petition here: https://www.parliament.uk/get-involved/sign-a-petition/paper-petitions/
